means: 非订作的便宜货，半新的

sentence.Network_en: Most of the boys wore hand-me-down military shirts from their fathers.
sentence.Network_cn: 多数男孩子穿着自己父亲穿过的旧军装衬衫。

sentence.Network_en: Eclectic style often highlights hand - me - down items, second - hand store finds, and other recyclables.
sentence.Network_cn: 折衷派的风格常使得半新不旧的东西 —— 二手店里的货物或是其它可重复利用的物品光亮照人.

sentence.Network_en: The younger children wore the hand - me - down of the older ones.
sentence.Network_cn: 较小的孩子穿兄姐们的旧衣服.

entry.tran: 别人用过的东西;（尤指）旧衣物
entry.def: Hand-me-downs are things, especially clothes, which have been used by someone else before you and which have been given to you for your use.

example.tran: 爱德华穿安德鲁穿过的旧衣服。

entry.def: Hand-me-down is used to describe things, especially clothes, which have been used by someone else before you and which have been given to you for your use.

example.ex: Most of the boys wore hand-me-down military shirts from their fathers.
example.tran: 多数男孩子穿着自己父亲穿过的旧军装衬衫。

means.word_mean: 1. outgrown garment passed down from one person to another
1. passed on from one person to another;
